``MINISTERUL JUSTITIEI`` 


> *Following the extremely controversial murder of a 15 year old boy by a 13 year old (alongside two other), which has led to many to call for minors that normally wouldn't answer to the law, to do so just as any other; a petition which has gotten over 300,000 signatures so far calls for this change in the law, in response, the Ministry of Justice has announced that, the boy who committed the murder will answer to the law as those that are at least 14 years old, and all three children who took part in the murder of the 15 year old will serve anywhere from 10 to 15 years in prison for their actions, and their records will not be possible to be clean ever again.*
> 
> *In the same idea, a recent trend which has sparked intense responses, of women being seemingly purposelessly murdered and/or harassed, mostly by former partners, because they have not been guided properly on how protection services work, etc. This has ultimately led to femicides being classed as a separate type of murder, and would also class police agents, etc. that have failed to properly respond to such an emergency as accomplices. Over the last year, over 50 such cases of senseless murder have been reported, and the special forces of the Romanian police have been given the task to, alongside normal units, arrest those responsible until the trial concludes, and from there, based on the evidence and actions, would be given sentences of anywhere from 15-25 years in jail, with no possibility for parole or pardons under any circumstance. They would also have to wear ankle bracelets so the police knows their exact location at any time. The President has stated that efforts, both through the educational system, and the justice system, will be made to eradicate this plague of senseless violence, and punishments will be adapted. Anyone at their second offense would spend at least 25 years in jail.*
